feeds.title: Reasonable Faith Podcast

feeds.title: Faithful & Just. With all things being relational!
feeds.description: When you sit back and open your mind and heart you will find that this podcast will allow you to be your authentic self. It is designed to make you feel naked and unashamed. Our goal is to inspire our listeners to dig deep within themselves and ask the hard questions that require honesty and transparency. We are looking forward to full engagement with our listeners and respect the thoughts and opinions of all that correspond with us. We are a Christian based platform and believe that Jesus (God) is our source of faith and our absolute rule of our...
feeds.author: RJ Hill
feeds.ownerName: RJ Hill

feeds.title: Faith Covenant Worldwide Audio Podcast

feeds.title: Think Biblically: Conversations on Faith & Culture
feeds.description: A weekly podcast that offers Christian perspectives on some of the most significant issues facing today's church and culture. In each episode, hosts Scott Rae and Sean McDowell — professors at Biola University's Talbot School of Theology — draw upon biblical wisdom and insights from guest experts as they explore how Christians can thoughtfully and faithfully engage with cultural trends and current events.
feeds.author: Talbot School of Theology at Biola University / Sean McDowell & Scott Rae
feeds.ownerName: Talbot School of Theology at Biola University / Sean McDowell & Scott Rae

feeds.title: Have Faith Let it Begin
feeds.description: My name is Angel and this is Have Faith Let it begin. This show is designed for the daily commuter. Our goal is to share Inspirational True Stories from my life and others. We invite you to put your trust in us to deliver you a show that will inspire and fill your day with joy. We know each day we go out into the world our Faith will be tested. We will battle the storms together. Have Faith Let it Begin.... any prayer request email me: angel@havefaithletitbegin.comWebsite: https://havefaithletitbegin.comYoutube: https://www.youtube.com/@havefaithletitbegin2018Twitter: @HaveFaithlibFacebook...
feeds.author: Have Faith Let it Begin
feeds.ownerName: Angel Santana Jr

feeds.title: Faith & Finance
feeds.description: Faith  & Finance is a daily radio ministry of FaithFi, hosted by Rob West. The program offers a practical, biblical and good-natured approach to managing your time, talents, and resources.
feeds.author: Faith & Finance
feeds.ownerName: FaithFi: Faith & Finance

feeds.title: The Path
feeds.description: Fr. Tom Soroka brings us the daily scripture readings and thoughtful commentary with quotes from the Fathers. Fresh every day Monday through Friday.

feeds.ownerName: Fr. Tom Soroka, and Ancient Faith Ministries

feeds.title: Irreverend: Faith and Current Affairs
feeds.description: Are you wondering how a Christian should respond to current events? What are we to think about a world that appears to be going absolutely mad? How are we to discern the signs of the times? In this podcast, featuring The Reverend Thomas Pelham, The Reverend Daniel French, The Reverend Doctor J.A. Franklin and the occasional guest, we attempt to give some answers. Email us at irreverendpod@gmail.com, follow us on Twitter @irreverendpod or on Telegram at https://t.me/irreverendpod. We also have a youtube channel which can be found by searching Irreverend: Faith and Current Affairs...
feeds.author: J.A. Franklin, T.J. Pelham, Daniel French
feeds.ownerName: J.A. Franklin, T.J. Pelham, Daniel French

feeds.title: The Lord of Spirits
feeds.description: Fathers Andrew Stephen Damick and Stephen De Young focus on enchantment in creation, and the union of the seen and unseen as made by God and experienced by mankind throughout history. Live on 2nd and 4th Thursdays at 6:00pm Central/7:00pm Eastern.

feeds.ownerName: HarperCollins Christian Publishers

feeds.title: Slow Theology: Simple Faith for Chaotic Times
feeds.description: Dr. A.J. Swoboda and Dr. Nijay Gupta are co-hosts of Slow Theology: Simple Faith for Chaotic Times. We talk Bible, theology, and anything and everything else under the sun that gives our lives meaning.

feeds.title: Wednesdays With Watson: Faith & Trauma Amy Watson- PTSD Patient-Trauma Survivor
feeds.description: Welcome to "Wednesdays With Watson," a compassionate and insightful podcast dedicated to exploring the complex journey of healing from PTSD, the role of faith in recovery, and the profound impact of trauma on our lives. Hosted by Amy Watson, a passionate advocate for mental health and a trauma survivor, this podcast aims to provide a safe and empathetic space for listeners to learn, share, and find hope.In each episode, we delve deep into the multifaceted aspects of Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) and its far-reaching effects. We bring you riveting personal stories of resilience, recovery, and transformation and expert interviews...
feeds.author: Amy Watson: Trauma Survivor, Hope Carrier, Precious Daughter Of The Most High God
feeds.ownerName: Amy Watson: Trauma Survivor, Hope Carrier, Precious Daughter Of The Most High God

feeds.title: For the Life of the World / Yale Center for Faith & Culture

feeds.title: FAITH, FIRE & FLOW
feeds.description: The Faith, Fire & Flow Podcast Show is THE show to wake you, shake you, break you where needed (!!) and ultimately bring you into alignment with the path of destiny that you came here to walk. This is for the entrepreneur, leader, creator, spiritually appointed messenger who absolutely knows that she or he was BORN to make millions, impact millions, and even change the world … and that it absolutely cannot be within the ‘normal’ framework of business or life … and who also knows that it is finally or fully time to surrender to all of that happening in and through and to and fr...

feeds.ownerName: Katrina Ruth

feeds.title: Faith Driven Investor
feeds.description: Faith Driven Investor is a growing movement of business leaders, fund managers, investors, and pastors who are driven by their faith. We believe that God owns it all and that he cares deeply about how we steward our investments. Our vision is for a world where Christ's followers can pursue excellent investments that allow for financial returns and Gospel-centered transformation. Every investment has an impact. What's yours?
feeds.author: John Coleman, Luke Roush
feeds.ownerName: Faith Driven Investor

feeds.title: Orthodoxy Live
feeds.description: Orthodoxy Live with Fr. Evan Armatas offers listeners an opportunity to ask pointed questions about the Orthodox Church. Perfect for seekers, converts, and cradle Orthodox Christian alike. Live on Sundays at 7:00pm Central/8:00pm Eastern.
feeds.author: Fr. Evan Armatas, and Ancient Faith Ministries
feeds.ownerName: Fr. Evan Armatas, and Ancient Faith Ministries

feeds.title: Evidence 4 Faith
feeds.description: Evidence 4 Faith is an apologetics ministry founded in 2021 by biologist and Bible speaker Michael Lane to equip Christians with the tools to defend their faith and point people to God through the study of the Cosmos. We research and develop free lessons and workshops covering areas of history and science to examine what is true and how God can be trusted through His Word: the Bible. This podcast hosts audio from all our lessons, ministry updates and guest conversations. You can find more resources and information at our website, evidence4faith.org.
feeds.author: Michael Lane
feeds.ownerName: Michael Lane

feeds.title: Explaining the Faith with Fr. Chris Alar
feeds.description: Each week, Very Rev. Chris Alar, MIC, director of the Association of Marian Helpers, examines in-depth an essential element of faith and morals that Catholics are called to proclaim, live, and celebrate. With wisdom, wit, and infectious enthusiasm, Fr. Chris digs deep into the richness, beauty, and truth of the faith that continues to transform hearts and lead people to God. May this podcast encourage your love of our Lord and love of your neighbor, especially of your brethren in the Church.
feeds.author: The Marian Fathers
feeds.ownerName: Marian Press

feeds.title: The Faith By Reason Podcast
feeds.description:
If God is real and Christianity is true, then they should conform to objective logic and reason. That is the premise of the Faith By Reason blog, which has been systematically examining Christian Philosophy since 2010. The Faith By Reason podcast is an extension of the blog, providing additional exposition and analysis (as well as my snide sense of humor). Nothing is taken for granted, no topic is too "sacred" to examine, and no question is off limits.  Get ready for an adventure!
faithbyreason.net
feeds.author: The Faith By Reason Podcast
feeds.ownerName: The Faith By Reason Podcast

feeds.title: The Saint Emmelia Podcast
feeds.description: The Saint Emmelia Podcast provides inspiring and informative resources and experiences that equip homeschooling families to educate the next generation of Orthodox faithful in North America.
feeds.author: Melissa Naasko, Fr. Noah Bushelli, Mindi Popovich-Schneider, and Ancient Faith Ministries
feeds.ownerName: Melissa Naasko, Fr. Noah Bushelli, Mindi Popovich-Schneider, and Ancient Faith Ministries

feeds.title: Feeding My Faith
feeds.description: I love God, but hate religion. Let's get back to you and God. It's pretty simple. Quick lessons, and maybe, just maybe, some fun. Can God be fun? Yes. Yes he can.
feeds.author: David Jackson
feeds.ownerName: David Jackson

feeds.title: Glory to God
feeds.description: Thoughts and reflections on Orthodox theology and life from Fr. Stephen Freeman.
feeds.author: Fr. Stephen Freeman, and Ancient Faith Ministries
feeds.ownerName: Fr. Stephen Freeman, and Ancient Faith Ministries

feeds.title: The Path to the Academy
feeds.description: A series of interviews with Orthodox educators and youth workers on what education is and why we need to spend time thinking about it.
feeds.author: Dr. Cyril Jenkins, and Ancient Faith Ministries
feeds.ownerName: Dr. Cyril Jenkins, and Ancient Faith Ministries

feeds.title: Saint of the Day
feeds.description: The Saint of the Day Podcast briefly tells the story of one of the venerable Saints commemorated in the Orthodox Calendar for that day. Our reader is a professional actor and an ordained Deacon in the Orthodox Church, Dn. Jerome Atherholt. Our source is www.abbamoses.com. - brought to you by Ancient Faith Radio
feeds.author: Jerome Atherholt and Ancient Faith Radio
feeds.ownerName: Jerome Atherholt and Ancient Faith Radio

feeds.title: I Don't Have Enough FAITH to Be an ATHEIST
feeds.description: Cross Examining ideas against the truth and Christianity. Brought to you by CrossExamined.org and AFR.net
feeds.author: Dr. Frank Turek
feeds.ownerName: Dr. Frank Turek

feeds.title: Real Faith Stories
feeds.description:
If you've ever felt frustrated because you've struggled to take the steps of faith you believe you should be taking, but hesitate because of fear of the unknown, Real Faith Stories can help.  
By hearing the true stories of everyday people who by faith, boldly and courageously took great risks, despite their fears – this podcast will help you believe that you can do it too.
So, listen and be encouraged.
You may be one step away from making the eternal impact you were created for, and becoming the answer to someone else’s prayer.
feeds.author: Brian Robinson
feeds.ownerName: Brian Robinson

feeds.title: Paradise and Utopia
feeds.description: A series of forty reflections on the history of Christian civilization, or Christendom. The entire podcast is organized around the theme of "paradise and utopia" - that is, of the civilization's orientation toward the kingdom of heaven when traditional Christianity was influential, and of its "disorientation" toward the fallen world in the wake of traditional Christianity's decline in the west following the Great Schism.
feeds.author: Fr. John Strickland, and Ancient Faith Ministries
feeds.ownerName: Fr. John Strickland, and Ancient Faith Ministries

feeds.title: Expanding your Faith
feeds.description: Expanding your Faith tackles modern day issues with a focus on spirituality. This podcast is produced by the hardworking staff at the Old Catholic Churches International’s Office of Communications and Media Relations. You can find us on the web at https://facebook.com/ExpandingyourFaith.
feeds.author: Bishop Greer Godsey
feeds.ownerName: Bishop Greer Godsey

feeds.title: Restoring the Faith Media
feeds.description: We produce content which truly captures the essence of our illustrious faith. We are boldly, authentically, and unapologetically Catholic. Like us on Facebook, support us on Patreon, and subscribe to our YouTube Channel today! Support this podcast: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/restoring-the-faith-media/support
feeds.author: Restoring the Faith Media
feeds.ownerName: Restoring the Faith Media

feeds.title: The Simple Path to God
feeds.description: Fr. Spyridon Bailey applies the teaching of the Church Fathers to modern life with reference to the Sunday gospels.
feeds.author: Fr. Spyridon Bailey, and Ancient Faith Ministries
feeds.ownerName: Fr. Spyridon Bailey, and Ancient Faith Ministries

feeds.title: Walking an Ancient Path
feeds.description: The Walking the Ancient Path podcast explores the joys and struggles of prayer and worship, sacraments, everyday asceticism, and the cultural adjustments on the journey into Orthodoxy (whether taking first steps or traveling deeper into the Faith).
feeds.author: Lynette Horner, and Ancient Faith Ministries
feeds.ownerName: Lynette Horner, and Ancient Faith Ministries

feeds.title: All Saints Homilies
feeds.description: Weekly sermons from All Saints Antiochian Church in Chicago, IL, preached by Fr. Pat Reardon.
feeds.author: Fr. Patrick Henry Reardon, and Ancient Faith Ministries
feeds.ownerName: Fr. Patrick Henry Reardon, and Ancient Faith Ministries

feeds.title: Frederica Here and Now
feeds.description: This podcast features fresh reflections on Frederica’s travel and experiences. She will talk to interesting people, tell us fascinating stories and share unique insight into the changing world in which we live.
feeds.author: Frederica Mathewes-Green, and Ancient Faith Ministries
feeds.ownerName: Frederica Mathewes-Green, and Ancient Faith Ministries

feeds.title: Hidden Saints
feeds.description: Hidden Saints is dedicated to bringing to light the many saints not generally known to most Orthodox Christians. Every day there are a multitude of commemorations in the Orthodox Church. This series hopes to tell their stories.
feeds.author: Fr. Steven Ritter, and Ancient Faith Ministries
feeds.ownerName: Fr. Steven Ritter, and Ancient Faith Ministries

feeds.title: The Monastery Trapeza
feeds.description: In the Orthodox monastic tradition, meals are often accompanied by spiritually edifying reading, so that soul and body may be nourished together. This podcast features weekly highlights from the trapeza readings of Holy Cross Monastery in Wayne, WV.
feeds.author: Heiromonk Gabriel, and Ancient Faith Ministries
feeds.ownerName: Heiromonk Gabriel, and Ancient Faith Ministries

feeds.title: In a Certain Kingdom
feeds.description: Is fiction dangerous? This podcast provides a spiritually and culturally enriching answer, beginning with a retelling ofa Slavic fairy tale or myth and proceeding to an analysis of the symbolic structure of that story.
feeds.author: Dn. Nicholas Kotar, and Ancient Faith Ministries
feeds.ownerName: Dn. Nicholas Kotar, and Ancient Faith Ministries

feeds.title: Food, Faith, and Fasting
feeds.description: This podcast is geared toward Orthodox and non-Orthodox Christians who want to care for their health in a spiritually minded manner. It focuses on ways to manage medical conditions such as weight loss, diabetes, high blood pressure, high cholesterol, gastric reflux, and more. Rita Madden’s theory of health management is based on the wisdom embodied in the Holy Orthodox Church.
feeds.author: Rita Madden, and Ancient Faith Ministries
feeds.ownerName: Rita Madden, and Ancient Faith Ministries

feeds.title: Good Guys Wear Black
feeds.description: This podcast is designed to provide information, encouragement, and entertainment for priests, other clergy, and those who love them. We'll talk about self-care and the many joys and challenges that come with the cassock.
feeds.author: Fr. Anthony Perkins, and Ancient Faith Ministries
feeds.ownerName: Fr. Anthony Perkins, and Ancient Faith Ministries

feeds.description: Faith over feelings Support this podcast: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/faithaboveall/support

feeds.ownerName: Sharon Akhigbe

feeds.title: Speaking the Truth in Love
feeds.description: Teaching and reflections by Fr. Thomas Hopko
feeds.author: Fr. Thomas Hopko, and Ancient Faith Ministries
feeds.ownerName: Fr. Thomas Hopko, and Ancient Faith Ministries

feeds.title: Pastoral Ponderings
feeds.description: The audio version of Fr. Patrick Henry Reardon's popular weekly meditation - Pastoral Ponderings. Fr. Pat distributes these all over the world and now, for the first time, they are available as a podcast through Ancient Faith Radio.
